description: Lists the tags available for a media pipeline.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The ARN of the media pipeline associated with any tags. The ARN consists of the pipeline's region, resource ID, and pipeline ID.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags associated with the specified media pipeline.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key half of a tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value half of a tag.
